Steve Blake , traded to Milwaukee in the offseason and acquired by Denver from the Bucks last week, had a career-high 25 points against his former team Sunday night, in Denver's 109-93 victory over Portland. I'm not surprised because a good basketball player is a good basketball player and that's what he is, said Steve Blake 's new teammate, Allen Iverson .
